entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening and ending near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
